attributes.action: Carrying knives in public places  should carry mandatory custodial sentence .
attributes.additional_details: To stop the amount of knife crime murders and discourage youths in gangs carrying knives.
attributes.background: Debate in Parliament and bring in new legislation.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase penalties for knife crime offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618505

Increase mandatory minimum sentences for carrying a knife, with no parole: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622234
